channel.title: [Delta]Npc Shouts

item.title: [Delta]Npc Shouts
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

logoxranger:

I don’t want to display all of them just start from the first one and end with the third one then repeat would it be easy if I just add a delay between the first one and second one then another delay between the second one and third?

You should just make it randomly select it from the 3 strings, it will rarely say the same dialogue twice in row(If that’s what you’re worried about).

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: [Delta]Npc Shouts
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Use a Math Floor to randomly select which String is chosen. You would need to create a new “shout” System if you want more than one line to display at once.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Npc Shouts
item.dc:creator: @logoxranger logoxranger
item.description:
@logoxranger wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 589) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Selling Rune essence!"; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Thieving portal on my right"; npcs[i].textUpdate = "RuneCrafting portal on my left"; } }
The thing above is my code for a npc, and I want it to say all three of these texts, yet it only says the last one.
How would I do this?

Read full topic
